data.name: X-Road Community Event 2020
data.location: Hilton Tallinn Park, Fr. R. Kreutzwaldi 23
data.description:
Welcome to global X-Road Community! These pages are meant for anyone interested in learning more about X-Road,
how the X-Road Community operates, and where to go for information.

data.name: Data
data.description: Machine learning, AI, Databases, and Big Data conferences.

relatedRecords.name: PostgresLondon
relatedRecords.description: PostgresLondon is the perfect opportunity for PostgreSQL users, developers, and anyone with a keen interest in the most advanced open source database for enterprises to get together and learn, share ideas, and network in one of the most international cities in the world.
